name: Dragon of the Frozen Voice
flavortext1: Delivers icy breath and feelings of intense apathy.
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\frozen_voice_resized.png

name: Aldric the Deceitful
flavortext1: A rabble-rouser, provacateur, teller of lies, collector of lapis lazuli, and enjoyer of fine wine.
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\aldric_resized.png

name: Master of Secrets
flavortext1: The Master of Secrets is feared across the Empire.
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\master_secrets_resized.png

name: Imperial Guard
flavortext1: 'The benefits aren't great, but on the plus side they say they won't kill my family.'
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\imperial_guard_resized.png

name: Imperial Guard
flavortext1: 'The benefits aren't great, but on the plus side they say they won't kill my family.'
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\imperial_guard_resized.png

name: Imperial Guard
flavortext1: 'For the Glory of the Autarch! May she ascend!'
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\imperial_guard_resized.png

name: Hall of Faces
actiontext1: When this obstacle triggers, place xxTHREAT as normal. Then place xxOBSTACLE Wrath of the Autarch at this location.
flavortext1: Nexus of sorcery within the Empire.
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\hall_of_faces.png

name: Horse Bandits
flavortext1: 'It's hard work - but what choice do I have?'
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\horse_bandits.png

name: Restless Dead
flavortext1: The undead walk home, looking to find their loved ones from long ago. What secrets do they tell?
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\undead1_resized.png

name: Restless Dead
flavortext1: The undead walk home, looking to find their loved ones from long ago. What secrets do they tell?
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\undead3_resized.png

name: Dragon of the Critical Word
flavortext1: What's worse, the acidic taunts or the literal acid breath?
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\critical_word_resized.png

name: Amber Hand Raiders
flavortext1: 'One day we'll reclaim our land.'
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\amber_hand_raiders.png

name: Corruption's Heart
flavortext1: Some things are more ancient than the Autarch. More ancient than all human lands.
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\corruptions_heart_resized.png

name: Wrath of the Autarch
flavortext1: 'It is time to unify the Empire.'
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\wrath_of_the_autarch.png

name: Mole Hunt
flavortext1: Spies are feeding important information back to the Empire. If we find them, what will we do?
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\mole_hunt.png

name: Background Checks
actiontext1: It costs +2 xxMOVE to leave this location.
flavortext1: 'You there! What's your business within the Empire?'
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\background_checks.png

name: Background Checks
actiontext1: It costs +2 xxMOVE to leave this location.
flavortext1: 'You there! What's your business within the Empire?'
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\background_checks.png

name: Guard Captain
flavortext1: 'You have a weird accent for a Southkeep Freetrader?'
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\guard_captain_resized.png

name: The Subtect
flavortext1: The Subtect is the Autarch's speaker for official Imperial matters.
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\subtect.png

name: Hogel's Jealousy
flavortext1: The Owner of One Thousand Horses is prone to jealousy. Flattery will get you everywhere.
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\hogel_resized.png

name: Allocating Funds
flavortext1: Political concerns necessitate allocating funds toward luxury projects.
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\allocating_funds.png

name: Zarrah's Paranoia
flavortext1: 'Welcome to the cultural center of the Settled Lands!'
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\zarrah_resized.png

name: Nosy Patrons
flavortext1: 'I keep seeing you, every Thursday night, like clockwork. And yet - you don't gamble and you don't drink? So what is it exactly you do?'
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\nosy_patrons.png

name: Distrustful Merchants
flavortext1: Farnaka glares at you. 'We have heard of your surreptitious acts. Now you treat us like criminals! You think we bring starsalt and other illicit drugs into your lands? Clean up your own house before you point fingers at ours!'
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\distrustful_merchants.png

name: Rage of the Forlorn Suitors
flavortext1: 'You! You have meddled and denied me my right, as Grand Leader of the Golden Hills,' Rastag said furiously. 'Pox Face was to be mine!'
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\rage_suitors.png

name: The Old Wounds
flavortext1: 'When the Five-Fold passed through Boar's Rift, we made space! You who had fled from the Empire's borders, we made space! And now we hear our ways are backwards. Our customs are not valued. Our songs are not sung.'
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\old_wounds.png

name: Grain Shortage
flavortext1: Without ample food, tensions run high and morale is depleted. Who can we trade with to overcome our shortfall? Can we reach beyond our borders?
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\grain_shortage_resized.png

name: Grain Shortage
flavortext1: Without ample food, tensions run high and morale is depleted. Who can we trade with to overcome our shortfall? Can we reach beyond our borders?
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\grain_shortage_resized.png

name: War Machines
flavortext1: Imperial war machines rain down fire and death.
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\war_machines.png

name: The Forgotten Dead
flavortext1: Those who have come before, who have sacrificed everything, are no longer remembered.
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\forgotten_dead.png

name: Ur-Akti
flavortext1: The swamp is ancient, alive, and vengeful. It is immune to our weapons of steel, and it moves quickly through the tangled growth of the forest.
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\ur_akti_resized.png

name: Yellow Blight
flavortext1: Before dying, the oozing yellow pox hamper breathing and cause madness.
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\yellow_blight_resized.png

name: Starsalt Addiction
flavortext1: 'What of this conflict matters to me? One ruler is the same as the next, we look forward to grander vistas than your limited worldview allows.'
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\starsalt_addiction_resized.png

name: The Weaver
actiontext1: May not muster at this location.
flavortext1: On the Weaver's loom is written the warp and weft of each life.
@mission_image: ..\images\ai_obstacles\the_weaver.png

name: Animaelic Echoes
flavortext1: Somewhere lies the Animaelic Forest, the source of shadow and light. Its echoes can be harnessed for great power.
